attributes.action: Reduce the Tax Added to the Price of UK duty paid cigarettes and tobaccos
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Due to the Smoking ban which came into force In The UK, Shouldnt the Tax added to the price of a packet of cigarettes now be reduced? Surely If you cant smoke where you want now, the price should also go down? After a hard day working for the government and this country all the "working class smokers want to do is sit down with a cold pint (taxed) and a cigarette(also taxed) Slowly but surely our freedoms are being taken away, so surely the price of a cigarette should gho down to make up for the price of our freedom? Either That Or the working class smokers unite and we overthrow the goverment and the upper class snobbery, "eith there so called "rules"... Power to the people oppose suppression and reduce tax on cigarettes and allow one of the few working class pleasures to stay.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
